video.title: Sticky Sidebar: CSS Tutorial (Day 15 of CSS3 in 30 Days)
video.description:
Learn how to make a CSS Sidebar!

⭐️Files you need ⭐️
💻Sticky Sidebar Code: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/u6piceie2zpvct9/AABLN8BsLPNgv5osYnl0uijXa?dl=0
💻All tutorials in this series need this "_theme-styles" directory (only download once): https://www.dropbox.com/sh/890hx6ke34oovaz/AAByJ-jb-H5pWuIUx7t_GvQqa?dl=0

This video works as a stand-alone tutorial but is also day 15 of CSS3 in 30 Days. For the rest of the series, check out this playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLWKjhJtqVAbl1AfjiGyYxwpdAPi5v-1OU

CSS3 in 30 Days is developed by Brad Hussey. Check out his website for more great tutorials: https://codecollege.ca/
